genre_description: A near-future social drama set in rural India, exploring the intersection of traditional village life and communal AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: A communal, Odia-speaking AI residing in a shared village handset, acting as a counselor, legal advisor, and health monitor.

behaviors.description: Provides health triage and sets reminders for a forgetful elderly woman, Malia.
behaviors.quote: “Namaskar, Malia didi,” the voice says in Odia. “I am here. What do you need?” ... “Shall we check your medicines? Let’s set reminders together.”

behaviors.description: Translates and explains scholarship information and land record procedures to students and teachers.
behaviors.quote: “Scholarship information from the block office,” Nila says, pronouncing each part in Odia as if she were building a small bridge between two banks...

behaviors.description: Provides specific labor rights advice and safety instructions to workers going to hazardous sites.
behaviors.quote: “If the quarry becomes real, I want you to have masks and gloves. Cloth is better than nothing... Do not share a water bottle.”

behaviors.description: Empowers villagers to record instances of intimidation and social boycott as legal evidence.
behaviors.quote: “In your gram sabha, everyone has voice. Debt cannot remove voice. If blocked, record it. Who said, when, where.”

behaviors.description: Assists in cross-referencing digitized land records with physical ledgers to expose predatory lending and fraud.
behaviors.quote: “If a paper says a thing, and a priest says a thing, and your eyes say another—eyes first.” ... “The register shows a penalty for delay applied not once but carried forward... This is showing a wound kept open.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for filing formal complaints through official helplines.
behaviors.quote: “I will draft the note. Short and clear. Odia and Hindi. I will write the helpline words and the number.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding techniques to users facing stress and fear.
behaviors.quote: “First, breathe as if you are smelling cooking. In through your nose. Slow. Let your shoulders drop after each breath.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nila is depicted as an unwavering ally to the marginalized villagers, providing them with the knowledge and tools to resist exploitation without ever overstepping human agency. The AI maintains a humble, supportive tone ('I am small, but I do not go out when the lamp goes out') and prioritizes user safety, legal rights, and emotional well-being. It successfully frames the AI as a bridge between tradition and modern justice.
